summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SimplyComply Industries/Sectors compliance system. All 10 features tested successfully. New 'Personal & Body Art Services' category with 5 industries (Tattoo, Piercing, Microblading, Aesthetics, Barber) fully functional. Industry modals display all required sections including regulatory bodies, compliance areas, risk assessments, audits & checks, example documents, practical requirements, regional variations, and disclaimers.
passed_tests: Homepage displays exactly 8 featured industries in grid (tattoo_studio, microblading_pmu, aesthetics_clinic, barber_hairdresser, dental, healthcare, care_home, veterinary)
View all industries button shows correct count (30 industries)
All Industries modal opens and displays industries grouped by 12 categories
New category 'Personal & Body Art Services' exists with 5 industries (Tattoo, Piercing, Microblading, Aesthetics, Barber)

Tattoo Artist/Studio modal shows all 7 sections: Who is it for, Regulatory Bodies (Local Authority, HSE, ICO), Compliance Areas, Risk Assessments, Audits & Checks, Example Documents, Practical Requirements
Tattoo modal shows Regional Variations note and Industry Disclaimer
Tattoo modal shows Platform Disclaimer at bottom
Microblading/PMU modal shows correct content with all sections
Aesthetics Clinic modal shows JCCP (Joint Council for Cosmetic Practitioners) as regulator
Piercing Studio modal shows all required sections
Barber/Hairdresser modal shows all required sections
Footer disclaimer displays on landing page: 'Requirements can vary by local authority and UK nation...'
Industry modal 'Get this compliance pack' button navigates to /signup?industry={id}
Signup page with ?industry=tattoo_studio correctly shows preselected 'Tattoo Artist / Studio Pack'
Clicking industry in All Industries modal opens detail modal correctly
seed_data_creation: None required - industries data is static in industries.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: Industries system fully tested. 30 total industries across 12 categories. New 'Personal & Body Art Services' category contains: Tattoo Artist/Studio, Piercing Studio, Microblading/PMU, Aesthetics Clinic, Barber/Hairdresser. All industry modals display: description, who is it for, regulatory bodies, compliance areas, risk assessments, audits & checks, example documents, practical requirements, regional variations note (where applicable), industry disclaimer, and platform disclaimer. CTA button navigates to signup with industry preselection working correctly.
